author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Fauci says that all states should have stay-at-home orders
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the nation's leading infectious disease expert and member of the Trump administration's coronavirus task force, said he doesn't know why some states still do not have a "stay-at-home" order in place to...
